conbody.p: Azure Data Lake Store destinationoverviewdestinationsAzure Data Lake StoreThe Azure Data Lake Store destination writes data to the Microsoft Azure Data Lake Store. Use the Azure Data Lake Store destination in standalone pipelines only at this time.
Before you use the destination, you must perform some prerequisite tasks.

When you configure the Azure Data Lake Store destination, you specify connection information such as the Client ID and fully qualified domain name (FQDN) for the account. You also enter a directory template to use for output files and an optional file prefix.
